item.title: Intro Podcast
item.description: The First Podcast Within these recordings are preserved the collective wisdom of the Old Gamers Ranting, shared with you through the magicks of the digital interwebnetubes so that you may learn and understand their highly enlightened opinions on video games, automobiles, parenting, current events and a veritable cornucopia of other topics, shared with you in their own words and with their own voices. (…except in the podcastisode when B-Diddy sounded like a robot for the entire conversation.
